entries.text: {'domain': 'Existential Reflections', 'principle': "Life's meaning can be found through confronting the 'terrible' unknown.", 'generalized': 'Understanding existence requires facing the ultimate mysteries or challenges.'}

source.book: Cioran, E. M. - Trouble With Being Born (Seaver, 2011)

entries.text: {'domain': 'Mental Well-being', 'principle': "Purposeful action defines wisdom; useful activities elevate one's status.", 'generalized': 'Engaging in meaningful or useful tasks is a key component of wisdom and self-worth.'}

source.book: Cioran, E. M. - Trouble With Being Born (Seaver, 2011)

entries.text: {'domain': 'Creative Process', 'principle': 'True artistic endurance stems from embracing the process of becoming, not just the finished product.', 'generalized': 'Sustained creativity is linked to accepting the ongoing development and change inherent in existence.'}

source.book: Cioran, E. M. - Trouble With Being Born (Seaver, 2011)

entries.text: {'domain': 'Mental Well-being', 'principle': 'Mindfulness and self-awareness help manage anxiety and find inner peace.', 'generalized': "Consciously observing one's inner state and experiences can alleviate distress."}

source.book: Cioran, E. M. - Trouble With Being Born (Seaver, 2011)

entries.text: {'domain': 'Creative Process', 'principle': 'Breakthroughs often require stepping away from routine and embracing novelty.', 'generalized': 'Personal or creative growth can be stimulated by engaging with new experiences or perspectives.'}

source.book: Cioran, E. M. - Trouble With Being Born (Seaver, 2011)

aggregated_from.book: Cioran, E. M. - Trouble With Being Born (Seaver, 2011)
